mapper.insert: insert into hr(ssn, pw, name, tel, corp, plate, auth) values(#{ssn}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{corp}, #{plate}, #{auth})
mapper.select: select ssn, name, tel, corp, plate from hr
mapper.update: update hr set name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, corp = #{corp}, plate = #{plate}, auth = #{auth} where ssn = #{ssn}
